page.title: 06Employment in Yewdale
page.content: The{farmers}obviously work the land within our area, and others find employment from the{tourist industry, {forestry,}and{quarrying.}Most people, however, with the exceptions already noted, have to travel to their employment. A wide variety of occupations is to be found outside those associated with agriculture, e.g.{shipyard}workers for Vickers in Barrow (a journey of 25 miles), tradesmen servicing the needs of the tourist industry, i.e. {plumbers, electricians, painters}and {decorators, joiners}and{builders. Workers regularly commute to such centres as{Barrow, Ulverston, {Ambleside}and{Kendal.}A scattering of professional people choose to live in the area and travel long distances to work.
